import React, {useRef } from 'react'; import { useTranslation } from "react-i18next"; import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import { Toast } from 'primereact/toast'; import Moment from 'react-moment'; // import { OrderStatusHistoryList } from './OrderStatusHistoryList'; export const SalesOrderInfo = (props) => { const {orderHeader,orderPart} = props; const toast = useRef(null); const { t } = useTranslation(); return (
{t('common:order.orderId')}: {orderHeader.orderId}
{t('common:order.entryDate')}: {orderPart.entryDate}
{t('common:order.approvedDate')}: {orderPart.approvedDate}
{t('common:order.currencyUomId')}: {orderHeader.currencyUomId}
{t('common:order.salesChannel')}: {orderHeader.salesChannelEnumId}
{t('common:order.productStore')} {orderHeader.productStoreId}
{t('common:order.enteredByParty')} {orderHeader.enteredByPartyId}
{t('common:order.status')}: {t(`status:OrderHeader.${orderHeader.statusId}`)}
{t('common:order.statusHistory')}:
); } SalesOrderInfo.propTypes = { orderId: PropTypes.string, orderPartSeqId: PropTypes.string, orderHeader: PropTypes.object, orderPart: PropTypes.object.isRequired };
